title: Pork chops with Asian pears
ingredients: ['4 boneless pork loin chops, about 140 g (5 oz) each, well trimmed of fat', '1 Asian pear, peeled, cored and cut into rings', 'sprigs of fresh coriander to garnish', 'Marinade', '4 tbsp orange juice', '2 tbsp soy sauce', '1 tbsp bottled hoisin sauce', '1 tbsp ginger wine', 'Spiced rice', '340 g (12 oz) basmati rice', '2 star anise', '2 cloves', '2 thin slices fresh root ginger, peeled', '20 g (¾ oz) butter', '1 tbsp sunflower oil', '1¼ tsp salt', 'pepper', '2 Asian pears, about 170 g (6 oz) each, peeled, cored and chopped', '2–3 tbsp finely chopped fresh coriander']
